response.overview: Barney's friend Tony shows off a box of numbers that he and his dad made. When a gust of wind blows them away, Barney and his friends must help him hunt for the missing numbers. Looking outdoors in the park and indoors the caboose, they find that numbers are everywhere! And what's a number scavenger hunt without "Number Limbo" and "Six Shake Pudding?" With two more to find, Barney invites the viewers to help look for numbers 9 and 10. Count on Barney to make learning super-dee-duper fun!
response.tagline: Learning is fun! Counting's as easy as 1, 2, 3
response.title: Barney's Numbers! Numbers!
